This feature relates to ipmi/pldm, but there is no corresponding code upstream in the community.

What should we do with the old meta-inspur?  It has fp5280g2.  Can we rename that layer to meta-ieisystems?  George is listed as the owner of that one but I don't know what the plan is.

> What should we do with the old meta-inspur?  It has fp5280g2.  Can we rename that layer to meta-ieisystems?  George is listed as the owner of that one but I don't know what the plan is.

Thanks Patric, meta-inspur has been removed.
Please use " consistently.
Done
Can we move away from having a custom "distro" here?  There are very few systems that did this and I'd like to be able to eliminate that pattern.
Done
Pretty sure this is a mistake.  There is no such variable anywhere else in the tree.  OBMC_CONTROL_FMT?
Acknowledged
I'm not really sure why yet another new system is using "skeleton".  Can we just drop this?

> I'm not really sure why yet another new system is using "skeleton".  Can we just drop this?

We should fix the pldm_git recipe to have this done correctly.  It looks like meta-ibm is creating a new mpackage config here also, which is probably the wrong thing to do.
